questions.text: Which Nirvana song popularized grunge with its release in 1991?
questions.explanation: Kurt Cobain's anthem changed the musical landscape, shifting focus from hair metal to grunge.

questions.text: Who sang 'I Will Always Love You' for 'The Bodyguard' soundtrack?
questions.explanation: Whitney Houston's cover of the Dolly Parton song spent 14 weeks at number one.

questions.text: Britney Spears debuted with which hit single in 1998?
questions.explanation: Her debut single shot to number one in every country it charted.

questions.text: Which boy band had hits like 'I Want It That Way'?
questions.explanation: The Backstreet Boys released 'I Want It That Way' in 1999.

questions.text: Alanis Morissette's 1995 album is titled 'Jagged Little _____'.
questions.explanation: 'Jagged Little Pill' is one of the best-selling albums of all time.

questions.text: Which Oasis song contains the lyrics 'So Sally can wait'?
questions.explanation: This britpop anthem was sung by Noel Gallagher.

questions.text: Who sang 'My Heart Will Go On'?

questions.text: Who is the lead singer of No Doubt?
questions.explanation: Gwen Stefani fronted the ska-punk band No Doubt before going solo.

questions.text: Which Ricky Martin song kicked off the 'Latin Explosion' in 1999?
questions.explanation: Livin' la Vida Loca was a massive crossover hit.
